strings: # This line is a code comment.
# Comments are lines that start with a #, and they do nothing to the code.
# Instead, they are to leave notes for whoever is writing it.
# Here, you can create your string. Name it whatever you want!
# Down here, you can print it out using the print() function.
# Put your variable name inside the parentheses.
# Its value will be displayed below!
builtins: # Up here, create your variable with input.
# Here, display your variable's output with print()
